This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{BE}} 0.12.x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.11.x releases.

|-

|
{{Drop|Item|Iron Ingot|3|5}}
{{Drop|Block|Poppy|0|2}}

|-

===Changed===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|General
|
|
* Burning creatures will make a "hissing" sound when the fire on them is extinguished.
* Mobs drop experience orbs when they die.
* Improved AI.
** Improved pathfinding within fences.
** Will seek water and seek shade when on fire.
** Now avoid lava.
|-
|[[Zombie]]
|[[File:Zombie JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
[[File:Baby Zombie Revision 1.png|64px]]
|
* Zombies can wear armor or pick up items.
* Have a small chance of dropping their armor and weapon on death.
* Now able to destroy doors.
* Zombies killed by a Charged Creeper explosion drop a [[Head#Zombie|zombie head]].
* Players can now be spotted from 40 blocks away.
|-
|[[Skeleton]]
|[[File:Skeleton JE4 BE2.png|128px]]
|
* Skeletons can put on armor or pick up items.
* Archery accuracy improved.
* Have a small chance of dropping their armor and weapon on death.
* The skeletons generated in the Nether are [[wither skeletons]].
* Skeletons killed by a Charged Creeper explosion drop a [[Head#Skeleton|skeleton head]].
* The sound of death becomes the same as Java version.
|-
|[[Creeper]]
|[[File:Creeper JE3 BE1.png|128px]]
|
* Creepers are generated after being hit by lightning during thunderstorms.
* Creepers killed by a Charged Creeper explosion drop a [[Head#Creeper|creeper head]].
* Stay away from [[ocelot]] (both wild and tamed varieties).
|-
|[[Enderman]]
|[[File:Enderman BE.png|128px]]
|Now avoid water.
|-
|[[Slime]]
|[[File:Slime JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|
* Small particles (visual effects) will be generated when jumping.
* Now drop [[slime ball]]s.
|-
|[[Magma cube]]
|[[File:Magma Cube JE1 BE1.png|128px]]
|
* Now generates properly in the Nether.
* Drop [[magma cream]] when killed.
* Added particle effects when jumping.
|-
|[[Zombie pigman]]
|[[File:Zombified Piglin JE3 BE2.png|128px]]
[[File:Baby Zombified Piglin JE2 BE1.png|64px]]
|
* Zombie pigman have become conditionally hostile.
* Zombie pigman will spawn in the Nether.
* Can put on armor or pick up items.
* Have a small chance of dropping their armor and weapon on death.
* Now drop [[gold nuggets]].
* There is a chance to spawn with an enchanted sword.
|-
|[[Villager]]
|{{Animate|Farmer.png; Librarian.png; Priest.png; Blacksmith.png; Butcher.png; Nitwit.png|128px}}
|
* Now has the ability to open and close doors.
* Can now harvest crops.
* Can now be bred.
* When attacked by a player, angry particle effects will appear.
* Villagers killed by zombies now always convert to a zombie villager on [[Difficulty#Hard|hard difficulty]].
** [[Zombie villager]]s can be healed using splash [[potion of Weakness]] and a [[golden apple]].
|-
|[[Spider]]
|[[File:Spider JE3 BE2.png|128px]]
|
* There were footsteps.
* Now drop spider eyes.
|-
|[[Ghast]]
|[[File:Ghast JE1 BE1.gif|128px]]
|
* Now spawns in the Nether.
* Now drop [[ghast tear]]s.
* Now makes a sound.
* Increased hitbox size.
|-
|[[Pig]]
|[[File:Pig JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
[[File:Baby Pig JE1 BE1.png|64px]]
|Will now turn into a [[zombie pigman]] after being struck by lightning during thunderstorms.
|-
|[[Wolf]]
|[[File:Tamed Wolf with Red Collar.png|128px]]
[[File:Baby Tamed Wolf.png|64px]]
|Tamed wolves will now attack the target after being attacked by a bow.
|-
|[[Silverfish]]
|[[File:Silverfish JE1 BE1.gif|128px]]
|No more noise when walking.
|}
